TopicTitle: My ksp crash when the loading is finish

Articles.Content: Well my last ksp play was a week ago then i wanna play it again erlier but when i launch ksp and wait for 30 mins(cause i have many mods) Then after the loading finish it just crash without saying anything its not my problem a week ago idk what happend. Plss help

“KSP crashes after loading” can be caused by several different things- an exception in the load/compiling process that stops the game from running, your PC running out of RAM, a Unity crash… We’ll need the logs to say for sure, here’s how:
